title: S2 Ep21: Targeting the ultra-poor in Afghanistan
itunes:title: Targeting the ultra-poor in Afghanistan
description: People who live in extreme poverty are increasingly concentrated in fragile and conflict-affected areas. Can a "big push" from the Targeting the Ultra Poor program help? Guadalupe Bedoya and Aidan Coville of the World Bank, and Mohammad Isaqzadeh of Princeton, are part of a team that evaluated the results of an attempt to lift 1,200 households out of poverty in Afghanistan.
itunes:author: VoxDev.org
dc:creator: VoxDev.org
